ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ="Service_Support_401k_S125_Case", NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Reassign_Category_1__c,"")), ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_2__c ,""), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c ,"Client Plan Year Rollover")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c ,"Consumer Move")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c ,"Case Question")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c ,"Manual ACH")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c ,"Security Breach S125")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c ,"Year End Call Campaign")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c, "Report Error â€“ HSA")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c, "Stop Payment (Broker Support Only)")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c, "Supporting Docs (LDPS Use Only)")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c, "PEP Due Diligence")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c, "Red Flag Review")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c, "Cancellation - HSA") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: All Reassign-Category levels must be selected in order to route the project correctly.
